Error, CareLink app requires bluetooth to connect the embedding device
Error, the bluetooth cannot be started

This is an exapmle text.To be, or not to be: that is the question:Whether tis nobler in the mind to suffer.The slings and arrows of outrageous fortune.Or to take arms against a sea of troubles.And by opposing end them. To die: to sleep;.No more; and by a sleep to say we end
